name: Keep Ivan Trotsky Alive
description:
Game created for Ludum Dare 46 in 72 hours

Help your blind grandpa get to the bed by throwing quacking ducks. However, be careful, he is paranoiac, and there is a huge number of different deadly traps in his house!

Three basic rules of the game:

  • He is blind and  goes to the sound
  • Grandpa never stops
  • He is reflected from the objects

I recommend playing EXE file for better experience instead of WEB VERSION
